name: Little Ninja (BenjaminWolfgang)
description:
Make your way through the Forest of Eternity while fighting strange creatures and obtaining mystical powers. 

Controls: A D, Space, E, F, J, Escape, Left Shift. 

Mouse to navigate the menus.

I'm unable to test the MacOS build at this time.

Please fill out this survey to let me know what you think about the game! Thank you in advance.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe-XzV6IkSTna3k39_0snmSakt5lmihd5v0CxL4...
